evermore_cup.step_2: <size=120%>- New & Free way to build your Wallet with Cash
evermore_cup.step_3: - Just by Playing in Our Free Evermore Cups up to 4x Daily you could win cash to put right into your Skillz Wallet
evermore_cup.footer: NO DEPOSITS NECESSARY TO WIN & WITHDRAW CASH

skillz_intro.step_1: You Will See a Signup Screen for Skillz - This is Needed to Store the Cash you Win and Withdraw - Create one, Even a Guest one
skillz_intro.step_2: To play for free and win cash, look for the Evermore Cup events. Tap View More to see all ongoing events
skillz_intro.step_4: This screen can take up to 1-minute to load. Please be patient
skillz_intro.popup_text: You would have made the top 10 in Evermore Cups Daily just now and made money
